Package cps.mouradalpha.ports

Class InBoundPortNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPort
            • fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
              • cps.mouradalpha.ports.InBoundPortNotification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.InboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class InBoundPortNotification
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements NotificationCI
    The class InBoundPortNotification defines the inbound port exposing the interface NotificationCI for components of type Broker.
    Author:
    Alpha Issiaga DIALLO / Mourad TOUATI
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      InBoundPortNotification​(java.lang.String uri, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI owner, int readExecutorIndex, int writeExecutorIndex)
      create the port under some given URI and for a given owner, we need also to specify the index for the read executor service and for the write executor.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void notifyDestroyTopic​(java.lang.String topic)
      calls the service method (notifyDestroyTopic) of the owner component (Broker) by executing a task using one of the component's threads.

      calls the service method (notifyPublish) of the owner component (Broker) by executing a task using one of the component's threads.

      calls the service method (notifyTopic) of the owner component (Broker) by executing a task using one of the component's threads.
